thread.title: Free scary face pancakes for kids at IHOP on Friday
thread.title_full: Free scary face pancakes for kids at IHOP on Friday

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free scary face pancakes for kids at IHOP on Friday
text:
Free scary face pancakes for kids at IHOP on Friday Free Scary Face Pancakes for kids at IHOP on Friday, Oct. 30. IHIOP/Courtesy Kids get a free ghoulicious pancake meal at IHOP on Friday. 
Kids can get a ghoulicious free meal at IHOP on Friday. 
From 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. on Oct. 30, kids ages 12 and under get a free Scary Face Pancake when dining in at participating restaurants. 
No coupon is necessary. 
Kids can decorate the giant buttermilk pancake, which arrives with whipped topping eyes, mouth and a strawberry nose, with mini Oreo cookies and candy corns. 
Kids also get a free coloring book, too. 
Click here for the deal. The offer is one per child. 
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts .
